sentences.en: A variety of Russian goods are forwarded through Sweden.
sentences.cn: 各种俄国货都是由瑞典转运来的.

sentences.en: German armoured divisions pierced the Russian lines.
sentences.cn: 德国装甲师突破了俄国的防线。

sentences.en: He both speaks and writes Russian.
He felt a strong affinity to the Russian girl.
sentences.cn: 他深受那个俄国姑娘吸引.

sentences.en: He quickly interpreted to me what the Russian was saying.
sentences.cn: 他把那个俄国人说的话很快地译给我听.

sentences.en: He quickly interpreted to us what the Russian was saying.
sentences.cn: 他很快把那个俄国人所说的话翻译给我们听.

sentences.en: I wish to furbish up the Russian I learnt at college.
sentences.cn: 我要重温一下我在大学里学过的俄语.

sentences.en: Livy's getting on very well in Russian. She learns very quickly.
sentences.cn: 莉薇的俄语很有起色，她学得非常快。

sentences.en: Russian is the one compulsory foreign language on the school curriculum.
sentences.cn: 俄语在学校课程设置中是一门必修的外语课。

sentences.en: She spoke with a phoney Russian accent.
sentences.cn: 她用一种伪装的俄国腔调说话。

sentences.en: Stalin's methods had industrialized the Russian economy.
sentences.cn: 斯大林采取的措施使俄国经济实现了工业化。

sentences.en: The airline was accused of playing Russian roulette with passenger safety.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司被指责将乘客安全当儿戏。

sentences.en: The modern Russian alphabet has 31 letters.
sentences.cn: 现代俄语字母表有31个字母。

sentences.en: The Ukrainians speak a Slavonic language similar to Russian.
sentences.cn: 乌克兰人所说的那种斯拉夫语系的语言类似于俄语。

sentences.en: Three-quarters of Russians live in cities.
sentences.cn: 四分之三的俄罗斯人住在城市里。

sentences.en: You are playing Russian roulette every time you have unprotected sex.
sentences.cn: 行房时不采取避孕措施是非常危险的。

phrases.tran_cn: 小俄国人；小俄罗斯（指俄国与基辅之间的一个地方）
俄国革命（指发生于1917年的二月革命或十月革命）
白俄罗斯（在历史上指东欧现今属于白俄罗斯的那一片区域）

trans.tran_cn: 俄国的，俄罗斯的，俄语的
trans.tran_en: relating to Russia, its people, or its language
